DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study learn lipid rich plaque use Near Infrared Spectroscopy ( NIRS ) /Intravascular Ultrasound ( IVUS ) image patient coronary artery stenting Optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) imaging .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Combined Near Infrared Spectroscopy ( NIRS ) Intravascular Ultrasound ( IVUS ) Catheter Detection Lipid Rich Plaque
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study : 1 . Test ability new NIRS IVUS system detect lipid pool 2 . Evaluate accuracy NIRS IVUS system localization lipide rich plaque : superficial v deep 3 . Improve diagnostic accuracy OCT detection lipid use information NIRS IVUS
DOC.criteria: Patient Characteristics 1 . Males nonpregnant female > 18 < 79 year age 2 . Patients refer diagnostic coronary angiography find lesion native coronary artery treat percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) ( patient know coronary lesion refer planned PCI ) 3 . Able give write informed consent Lesion Characteristics 1 . Lesion native coronary artery 2 . Angiographic stenosis > 50 % 3 . Reference vessel diameter 2.5 mm 4.0 mm visual estimation 4 . Subjects successful PCI OCT General Exclusion Criteria 1 . Subjects unable unwilling sign inform consent form 2 . Subjects serious comorbid condition judgment investigator preclude inclusion study ( terminal cancer , life expectancy < 6 month , Liver Function Tests ( LFTs ) > 3 time Upper Limit Normal ( ULN ) , posttransplant ) 3 . Subjects New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) class III IV heart failure know leave ventricular ejection fraction < 30 % 4 . Subjects experience STelevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) within 72 hour prior procedure 5 . Subjects hemodynamic electrical instability ( include shock ) 6 . Subjects diagnose severe , noncatheterrelated coronary artery spasm 7 . Subjects may pregnant 8 . Subjects know allergy contrast medium 9 . Subjects renal failure define estimate Glomerular Filtration Rate ( eGFR ) < 60 . 10 . History Transient Ischemic Attack ( TIA ) stroke < 6 month Lesion Specific Exclusion Criteria These exclusion criterion apply target lesion image NIRS IVUS . 1 . Lesion locate leave main coronary artery 2 . Lesions heavily calcify 3 . Lesions OCT perform due technical difficulty 4 . Other lesion investigator deems inappropriate procedure lesion excessive tortuosity , presence thrombus , low flow TIMI grade .
